physics_justification.alpha_hybrid_validated: Ceiling breach at 10^6 tree size - baseline hybrid alpha
physics_justification.instability_validated: Zero tolerance for instability at all scales
physics_justification.degradation_tolerance: Max 1% alpha drop allowed across scales (physics-expected)
physics_justification.scalability_gate_threshold: Minimum alpha at 10^9 for gate pass

scale_physics.why_decay: Minimal decay because fractal structure is self-similar at scale. At 10^9: 3 * 0.025% = 0.075% total decay.

description: Immutable multi-scale validation parameters. Validates quantum-fractal hybrid at 10^9 production scale with scalability gate before 3.1 push.
